info.task: navigate to previous colum containing link in grid
info.title: Navigate to the previous colum containing a link in a grid in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFourthDataCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the fourth cell of the second row in the grid

user: Navigate to the previous column containing a link in the grid.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the previous column containing a link in the grid.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Description') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 3, row 2) are conveyed
